extDescription.message: Quick image view assistant for Mastodon client

descSettingPreserve.message: `Preserve statuses shown` option can be used to keep track of 100 images shown so far. But it also disables Boost and Favourite buttons.

descSettingOink.message: "Oink!" button is useful when you want to do both download and favourite.

settingPreferSpeed.message: Prefer loading speed to image quality
